price: 52. Wonna hinnay keenik kulli seehadayti fakut tan kitooba iseh tantacawwimeeh geyam faxa.
arabic: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفٗا مُّنَشَّرَةٗ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: bal yurīdu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yu'tā ṣuḥufan munasharatan
